parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The task ID. You can call the [CreateSimilarSecurityEventsQueryTask](~~CreateSimilarSecurityEventsQueryTask~~) operation to obtain the task ID.
